result.eng: I failed to reach the top.
result.ga: Theip orm an barr a bhaint amach
result.orig: Theip orm an barr a bhaint amach
result.html: Theip orm an barr a bhaint amachI failed to reach the top.
result.ponchtml: Ṫeip orm an barr a ḃaint amaċI failed to reach the top.

result.html: Theip orm sa scrúdúI failed the exam.
result.ponchtml: Ṫeip orm sa scrúdúI failed the exam.

result.eng: If they failed, it is not known why.
result.ga: Má theip orthu ní fios cén fáth
result.orig: Má theip orthu ní fios cén fáth
result.html: Má theip orthu ní fios cén fáthIf they failed, it is not known why.
result.ponchtml: Má ṫeip orṫu ní fios cén fáṫIf they failed, it is not known why.
